name: Inside the Clockwork Pussy
description: Now, Anais is a formidable boss of a criminal organization that trades and produces an exotic hallucinogenic mushroom. Such a mushroom sexually stimulates its users, making them avid and active pornographic performers.

name: Apple Bag
description: Working the late-night shift as a cashier in a small town, you starts to form good relations with your regulars. Between flirtations and friendly banter, the specter of a mysterious disappearance haunts your nights as you’re exposed to more and more suspicious behaviors. Are your regulars linked to the missing student, and, more importantly, will you secure a Halloween date?

name: Warlings 2: Total Armageddon
description: You are the soldier, you are the general, you are the squad! Take control of your Warlings troops to win the battles! Choose from wide range of weapons to bring destruction upon your enemies and battlefield! Be smart and precise in steps you take, you can outplay your opponent at any time. Win battles, earn gold, expand you arsenal and unlock new classes of soldiers to get ready for next skirmish!

name: SCP: Valravn
description: You Never Lose a War, When War Is What You Sell. Play the role of a member of the elite Mobile Task Force to uncover the story of the Valravn Corporation, a shady PMC group involved in human experimentation.

name: Magicolor TD
description: This game is a fresh take on tower defense strategy, where it's not just about stacking numbers but engaging in a dynamic play of colors. Change the colors of your towers, enemies, terrain, and magical artifacts to create various offensive and defensive effects through color matching. "Magicolor"

name: Enlightening the Soul Country Light
description: This is a 3D ARPG third person action adventure game developed with Journey to the West as the main background. You will experience China's long traditional cultural history and kung fu culture through this game

name: Catch Flex: AI Dance Game
description: Dive into "Catch Flex," the dance game where professional choreography meets advanced AI motion tracking. Just use your iPhone or Android camera – no extra gear needed! Mimic our dance coach's moves for scoring and calorie counting. Perfect for solo fun or group enjoyment with friends and family.

name: D.Beta
description: It is a casual game in which you solve various puzzles by manipulating the character with the keyboard in space. The curious “D.” “Alpha” is a cool robot. While flying freely in the sky, you see a wonderful spaceship. It's the story of a robot who enters a spaceship and causes chaos.

name: The Verge Miner
description: The Verge Miner is an immersive mining, tower defense, and action roguelike game. Jump through asteroids on The Verge of space, and mine valuable resources. These uncharted rogue rocks are filled with space aliens you need to protect yourself against. Choose and upgrade gear for your play style.

name: Crazy Castle
description: Crazy Castle is a crazy competitive party game where you smash your friends in chaotic Death-Matches and Mini-Games. Upgrade your character as you creep through a spooky castle of zany characters and unique levels to claim your crown!

name: Plaquist Simulator
description: Plaquist Simulator, a captivating simulation game that immerses players in the demanding world of construction. Undertake the construction of perfect partitions, manage your business, and evolve to become an expert in the field. An immersive experience for construction enthusiasts.

name: Wheel Runner
description: Sin descripción

name: FreshWomen: Season 2
description: FreshWomen is a choice-driven adult Visual Novel focusing on the best parts of life. Become a freshman attending Minerva Bay College, romance girls and solve a mysterious incident. Your journey will be filled with comedy, drama, and lots of sex.

name: FNaF 2: Night of Misfits
description: Sin descripción

name: Fat Lads
description: The ultimate party game for belly laughs! Dive into a gut-busting gaming experience featuring various hilarious modes to keep you and your CHUNKY LADS entertained! Every moment in FAT LADS is a phat celebration of friendship and laughter! Supports up to 100 players online!

name: Meat-Grinder
description: Live the life of Obi, a female killer with questionable morals and a good sense of humor! Witness a real human meat grinder performed by her and meet many unique characters on her way!

name: Shepherd Planet
description: Shepherd Planet is a leisure puzzle simulator game in which you play a witty sheepdog and drive the lambs into the sheepfold.

name: Juniper Burning
description: Juniper Burning is a third-person story driven fighting game featuring fast-paced traversal and platforming. Join a young Warrior possessed by an ancient fire demon in a desperate attempt to protect his homeland

name: Spriggan
description: Enter 'Spriggan,' a captivating multiplayer, first-person strategy game. Master combat, crafting, or city management. By day, focus on city growth and resources; by night, unite with friends to protect your castle from mysterious forces...

name: Midnight Kun
description: This is an open-world multiplayer online game where, after being infected with avian flu, Kunkun mutated into a terrifying monster. As a good friend of Kunkun, Susan decides to venture into the forest to seek the Lion Leopards, aiming to rescue Kunkun.

name: Rat Trap
description: Swap, fuse and split to escape! A fast paced, hand-drawn metroidvania adventure based on multiple unique characters that you can fuse together or split apart at will. Use these powers to explore a mysterious facility, solve puzzles and beat the bad guys! Can you escape the Rat Trap?

name: Monkey's Life
description: A stylized emotional role-playing game. The story of a fantastical encounter with a monkey that uses the keyboard to escape from the zoo.

name: Slippery Heights
description: Younger, I used to play these games...silently shedding a tear.

name: Regular Fit
description: Regular Fit is a 2D platformer. As a tramp, you embark on a dangerous and mysterious journey through a dense forest full of amazing creatures and unseemly obstacles. Your main goal in this game is to survive in this cruel world.

name: Small Demon
description: Small Demonis a 2D action roguelike that immerses you in the dark world of hellish labyrinths. As a small but powerful demon, you will face countless different enemies who are trying to destroy you! You need to move around the location, pick up more powerful weapons and destroy enemies.

name: Warpgate Pioneers
description: Warpgate Pioneers is a game about running around in spaceships with friends. Build your own spaceship, play as the crew on somebody else's spaceship, or form a fleet to take on the mysteries beyond the Warpgate together.

name: A Long Dark Night
description: A Long Dark Night is a Lovecraftian narrative-driven game. Navigate the stormy Gulf of Maine, unraveling the truth behind your family's past. Explore a beautiful seaside, shape the narrative with your choices, and confront shocking revelations in this gripping story, taking place at sea.

name: Gamblemancer TD
description: Gamblemancer TD is a tower defense game where you decide how your towers work. Customize 6 different towers based on typical role-playing dice D4 to D20.

name: Kingdom's Deck
description: Kingdom's Deck is a city-builder and deck-builder game where you embark on a journey to transform your humble hamlet into a formidable empire. Deploy your cards wisely, defend your walls from sieges, manage your resources, respond to various exciting events, and create the ultimate Kingdom's deck!

name: Paper Sky
description: Experience the rush of an adrenaline-fueled paper plane adventure in an interactive semi-open world. Explore stunning landscapes in various art styles as your paper plane transforms into a ball, rolling and soaring through thrilling challenges for an unparalleled high-flying action!

name: Opera Nova
description: A 3D Music Experience for VR

name: Eternal Struggle
description: A game that combines hardcore platforming of classics like Celeste with mind-bending puzzles with lasers, portals, and many more.

name: The Ever-Changing Jianghu
description: The Ever-Changing Jianghu is a light rogue martial arts RPG game that strives to incorporate the essence of fast-paced rogue gameplay into the world of RPG. You will make choices in drastically different starting scenarios, providing you with a "unique experience every playthrough" in the RPG realm.

name: Europa Truck Driving Sim 2021
description: Sin descripción

name: Dani to Evan: Kids Note
description: Sin descripción

name: Last Breakers
description: A vertically scrolling shooter for the PC-98 by doujin group CO2-PRO.

name: Host Security Guard
description: Sin descripción

name: Sonic Robo-Blast! From The Past
description: Sonic Robo-Blast! From The Past is a remake of two classic fangames from 1998 on a new engine in "standard definition 480p widescreen" with rad new features!

name: Lunistice 1.5: Accel Coda
description: Lunistice 1.5: Accel Coda is an upcoming free content update for Lunistice, it overhauls major parts of the base game, ranging from new character models and animations to minor and major reworks of the original levels! Besides Accel, it also adds three additional playable characters - each with their own bonus stage. And if you like replayability, the new Randomizer Mode will have you covered!

name: Italian Super Car
description: Sin descripción

name: Locked
description: Locked in a deadly cat-and-mouse with a relentless serial killer, you must outsmart, escape, and survive in this intense 2D horror experience. Solve chilling puzzles, and stay one step ahead of a relentless pursuer. Inspired by PS1-PS2 classics and iconic horror films.

name: Fathomless
description: Travel alongside Plane as he delves deeper and deeper into the twisted tunnels of a long-forgotten cave. Don't worry though, as you'll always have your pal Franklin by your side! With the two of you working together this cave should be a breeze...

name: Crash Landed
description: An unreleased Crash Bandicoot game which would have had Crash trying to save primitive bandicoots (or 'bandicutes' as they were called in the concept art) from Neo Cortex. It was cancelled after 2 years of being in development and Activision after acquiring rights to the franchise decided to lay off the entire Radical Entertainment studio behind Crash Landed.

name: Super Pac-Man Pinball
description: An unreleased follow up to Pac-Man Pinball Advance, why it got cancelled is unknown.

name: The Bodega Court of Salty DQs: Amai Edition
description: A visual novel featuring a young man named Dennis, who must save a thug operated restaurant by winning two million dollars in a tennis tournament.

name: Sweet Flip
description: Honey, please turn over the cards and see which girl you like, or you want them all.

name: Artillery Blast
description: Come and cum! The young ladies feel so uncomfortable, they are trapped inside and can hardly breathe.

name: Whispers in the West: Two Bad Sisters
description: From the writer of “Overboard!”, Jon Ingold - Miss Sara Estelle has arrived in Brimstone, and she needs your help tracking down a valuable possession left in the care of the priest. There’s only one problem: the priest swears she already came and collected it herself!

name: Veil
description: Demon-powered tactical FPS.

name: Dragon Shelter
description: Dragon Shelter is a farm sim set in a fantasy world. Take on the role of a hero who will revive the long-lost friendship between humans and dragons. Take care of wondrous creatures, explore the magical world, and restore destroyed biomes!

name: Land of Ramchin: Between Dimensions
description: Land of Ramchin is an Action RPG adventure game where players will play as Vico to explore the fantastic open world of the vast land of Ramchin, travel between dimensions and seek the origin of the world.

name: Slasho
description: Dive into Slasho, a mouse-driven bullet hell roguelike where your precision guides a samurai's blade. Cut through hordes, unlock skills, and face unique enemies in this action-packed quest for supremacy. Are you ready to defy death and embrace the samurai's path?

name: Uber Urban
description: A modern, indie, interpretation on the well established genre of city builders; meet Uber Urban. With genre-defining mechanics as well as more innovative ones, Uber Urban enables players to build the city of their dreams like never before.

name: Green Again
description: Green Again is a chill and cozy city builder game. Help a tribe of little plant people reclaim their planet taken over by defective robots. Build, decorate, and expand your settlement. Grow crops for your citizens, explore the unknown, and return the land to its former green state!

name: Cell Hacker
description: A cellular automaton-like MMO game based on text terminals. Players will write unique cell reproduction logic and place cells in the vast cell world to grow, reproduce, compete, cooperate with other players' cells, and write their own species history.

name: Tales Of Two Heroes
description: Tales Of Two Heroes is a roguelite deckbuilder about two heroes saving the world. Fight, collect, and survive. Who would reach the Altar first, and bring peace to this land?

name: Orcs in the Forest
description: Orcs in the Forest is an exciting 2D platformer where a cute bunny goes on an exciting adventure in a wonderful forest. Your main goal is to collect as many carrots as possible, and many obstacles and enemies await you along the way.

name: Climb Up! Battle Royale
description: Stay at the top or reach the top by competing with both your friends and others. Push, shoot and knock down your opponent and above all, have fun!

name: Super Space Planet Fighter
description: Fight fast-paced boss battles against Moons, Planets, and even Stars as you travel through solar systems on a perilous mission to destroy the Core of the Universe as pirates, aliens, and cosmic horrors hunt you down while you explore the depths of the cosmos and collect unique technologies.

name: The Milgram Experiment
description: A first person narrative game, based on one of the most controversial psychological experiments of all time. Step into the shoes of an unwilling subject faced with the toughest moral choice: who lives and who dies. You alone will decide who to kill and who to spare. Please wishlist!

name: Lost in Dread
description: A first person horror adventure game where you play as a timid protagonist- experiencing a near death experience caused by his bullies sending him to a ghost realm. To reduce your character's fear, take all necessary steps, such as covering your ears.

name: Level Unknown: Backrooms
description: Embark on a chilling journey into the unknown with the game "Level Unknown: Backrooms," a horror-puzzle set in the mysterious realm of the Backrooms. Test your logical skills and nerves in both a single-player adventure or a multiplayer cooperative mode.

name: Quitting Simulator
description: You're a disgruntled office drone who gets creative when your dystopian employer won’t let you quit. Armed with a quirky arsenal of improvised weapons (and trusty magic fishing rod) you set off on a quest to climb the corporate ladder, and free yourself from the shackles of bureaucratic oppression.

name: BattleProgress
description: You want to create your own battleplan? Keep the overview and outplay your opponent with brilliant moves! Manage your economy and research whisly to create the perfect composition of units which defeat the opponent and his army, but be carefull: The opponent will try the same!

name: Guns'N'Wheels
description: Fast cars with big guns. Customisable, Arena Based, Vehicular Combat. Play Singleplayer story mode or compete in Multiplayer high skill battles, unlocking arenas, cars and decals. Rank up to be crowned a Legend. Play in Single player, Online PvP or Split screen.

name: Versebound
description: Versebound is a challenging action roguelike with bullet hell elements. Slay hordes of enemies and dodge projectiles in handcrafted environments, outmaneuver versatile boss encounters and collect XP to craft your optimal build! Here, verses wield power...

name: Tempo Cube
description: Rhythm with Tempo Cube! This is a rhythm game, Cube will bounce between walls and blocks to rhythm with the music. Use WASD along the move directions at the right time to score and combo! You may upload your own midi file to create your custom game scene!

name: Heptic Arena
description: Heptic Arena is a Free to Play Online Action Multiplayer Shooter Arena where contenders are competing against each other in an Intergalactic Game Show.

name: A Long Survive
description: Will you be able to survive? Long Survive is a cooperative shooter in which you'll have to survive waves of enemies. Protect the nexus by fortifying your area with various structures and prepare for the siege. Upgrade your weapons, strategize with your teammates. Survive!

name: Rift: Genesis
description: Stylized Sci-Fi Movement FPS with and influence on melee and shooter based combat and abilities. That takes place across dimensions.

name: Five-Star: Chef Ops
description: Make no mistake rookie - this ain't a cooking game. This is a tactical kitchen simulation with a hint of cooking. Dive into the culinary universe of Five Star: Chef Ops, a strategy-packed adrenaline ride where every second drains profits and every miscalculated action brings calamity upon you.

name: Sacrifices
description: Dive into the 'Sacrifices', a narrative-driven adventure game where you unravel the poignant tale of a child's reality.

name: Ulimek
description: Ulimek is a fast-paced platformer where you dash through the levels as fast (or as chill) as you like using a similar hookshot mechanic.

name: Neon Life
description: [Neon Life] is Aoki Studio's first self-developed 3D project, an anime cyberpunk-style open-city role-playing game.

name: Dark Gaze: Curse of the Black Nazar
description: It is night time at the occult museum. As curator, you have acquired a strange artifact. Unaware of its dark nature, you place it on its reserved spot between other artifacts. You notice that strange events starts to occur. Eventually realizing that you, might not be the only living creature inside.

name: Ninja: The Lost Legacy
description: A stealth fast-paced ninja game where you eliminate your enemies with elegance to get the artifacts that have been stolen from you. Inspired from movement shooters, stealth games and ninja culture. Different terrains and settlements will let you carve various approach to enemy territories.

name: Apocalypse Inc
description: Welcome to Apocalypse Inc, the ultimate idle game where you take command of apocalyptic minions and unleash chaos upon the world!

name: Dawn of Demons
description: Become a medieval monk and confront the demon that has haunted the Boar Lake village.

name: The Inn at Nightfall
description: Manage an inn for travelers seeking refuge before nightfall. Interact with diverse guests, each harboring their own secrets. Your choices can forge or fracture relationships, uncovering hidden truths along the way. But beware - the real threat may be hiding among your guests.

name: The Eye of Typhoon: Tsunami Edition/Saiki
description: The Eye of Typhoon: Tsunami Edition/Saiki is a fan-made project aiming to bring The Eye of Typhoon to the platform it was originally developed on, the Neo Geo, and overhaul it.

name: Baba Yaga learns to read
description: Educational game for learning to read

name: Just Dance 2015 China and Just Dance 2017 China Combo Pack
description:
A combo pack with Just Dance 2015 China (舞力全开2015) and Just Dance 2017 China (舞力全开2017)

The only version we know of is for Xbox One

name: Pesterquest Rewritten
description: A fanmade rewrite of Homestuck - Pesterquest!

name: Sweet Skullvivors
description: Unleash the power of Mexican food to survive the hordes of hungry Alebrijes. Make the most colorful and delicious Ofrenda the world has ever seen.

name: Null
description:
Null is a fast-paced sci-fi Arena FPS inspired by the all-time classic "Quake III Arena"!
In this game you play as a robot fighting against other players in online Free-For-All matches.

name: Normal Super Mario Bros. Trilogy DX
description:
Normal Super Mario Bros. is a series of fangames created by gamester and released for PC. Trilogy DX is a port of the original games, with enhanced features, making the games available in other platforms.

The first the was released in December 2023, with the first game 99% and the second about 60% complete. The third game wasn't available yet.

name: Normal Super Mario Bros. 2 DX
description: An enhanced port of Normal Super Mario Bros. 2.

name: Normal Super Mario Bros. DX
description: An enhanced port of Normal Super Mario Bros.

name: Occultryx: Beast of Nocturne
description: Occultryx: Beast of Nocturne is a story that follows the Bounty Hunter H-13 "Dysis" Hunting down a rival and elusive bounty. A werewolf master of combat who has taken over a mysterious facility on the planet Stygia. The nearby city and surrounding areas have been infected with the wolf's curse. It's Dysis' job to wade through the the creatures, hazards, and minions to track down her bounty!

name: Tech-Panic
description: Tasked with collecting presents, the goofy little robot boy is back and ready to do his best.

name: Headmaster Disaster
description: It's a new school year at Sawfish High School, but with the entrance of a mysterious new principal, it's no longer ordinary. Teachers are acting strangely and students are ferocious and feral. Follow Hazel and Petros as they not only fight for their grades but also their minds and uncover secrets about their world's past. But remember, there's no homework, that is... because you may never come home.

name: ErMa: Early Mammal
description: A mysterious force has set up shop in the distant past, and is doing everything in its power to ensure reptiles - particularly, dinosaurs - remain the planet's dominant life for good. Erma is our completely unwitting heroine, and it's your job to help her help us!

name: House spirit cat
description: Kot-Domovoy is a visual novel with interactive features. It’s a story about a kind spirit of a house in the shape of a cat who is searching for a new owner. Will it find a new home or a place of despair? You are to choose.

name: Bracket Chain
description:
An action-packed adventure where you dash, grab, and fling your way through a variety of stages!
Follow the robot Bracket as he ventures out of his technology-driven home realm and into Alastair, a mysterious new realm governed exclusively by magic. Meet determined allies, heartfelt villagers, zany goons, and dangerous villains.

name: Sonic Drift 16-Bit
description: Get ready to race with Sonic Drift 16-bit, the electrifying Genesis-style kart racer brought to you by the creators of Sonic Triple Trouble 16-bit! This bold Game Gear reimagining speeds its way into the spotlight, delivering an exhilarating "best-of" the Sonic Drift series in a vibrant, revamped form!

name: Habanero-tan House
description: Sin descripción

name: Wildwood
description: Wildwood is a short anthology visual novel about fairy tales and folklore from Europe, Britain and Russia

name: Holos lisu
description: Holos lisu is an exciting story based on Ukrainian folklore. Enter the role of an agent of the Police Bureau of Investigation and find out what secrets the forest hides. Meet local residents and immerse yourself in their stories. Put the puzzle pieces together to see the full picture and reveal Yvette's story. Hear the voice of the forest!

name: Kid Icarus
description: Sin descripción

name: Star Fox Wii
description: An unreleased Star Fox game that was intended for the Wii. Some of it’s intended aspects were later used in Star Fox Zero

name: Team Slay-Bells
description: Team Slay-Bells is about a reindeer named Charlotte and her friends, who are trying to help their home planet Kringlaus.

name: Yrkkey's Paradise
description: A raccoon builds a computer and enters cyberspace.

name: Nourish
description:
A pleasant puzzle, chill and wholesome as a capybara taking care of a garden.

I made this game to remind myself to nourish the aspects of my life that are dear to me.

name: Spades+
description: Sin descripción

name: Texting the Awkward Ace Guy You've Had a Crush on Since High School
description: It's tough having a crush. Especially when that crush is on your best friend. And especially when that crush lasts five, ten years! But it's OK—you can text him! Who knows, maybe he'll finally figure out what you've been unable to say these many years. Or, you'll just annoy him! Either way.

name: Baseball Pro's
description: Sin descripción

name: 11-A-Side Soccer
description: Sin descripción

name: Moto X
description: Sin descripción

name: 3D Star Fighter
description: Sin descripción

name: Sky High Stuntman
description: Sin descripción

name: Bigfoot
description: Sin descripción

name: Grand Prix
description: Sin descripción

name: Pro Power Boat
description: Sin descripción

name: Kameo 2
description: An unreleased sequel to Kameo: Elements of Power.

name: Light No Fire
description: A game about adventure, building, survival and exploration together. Set on a fantasy planet the size of Earth.

name: Exoborne
description: Exoborne is an open-world, tactical extraction shooter set in a world torn apart by extreme forces of nature. Customize powerful exo-rigs to gain strategic advantage in ever-changing weather conditions. Face hostile factions, enemy players, and Mother Nature herself in intense high-stakes sessions.

name: Den of Wolves
description: Den of Wolves is a co-op heist FPS from the creator of Payday: The Heist, Payday 2 and GTFO. In this techno-thriller you and your friends operate as criminals for hire in the conflicts between rival corporations in Midway City. Gather your crew, design the plan, gear up and execute the heist.

name: Last Sentinel
description: Set decades from now in a reconstructed Tokyo, you play as Hiromi Shoda in Last Sentinel, a narrative-focused, open-world action game from Lightspeed Studios.

name: Marvel's Blade
description: In Marvel’s Blade, Eric Brooks is the legendary Daywalker, half-man, half-vampire torn between the warm society of the living and the rushing power of the undead. From Bethesda and Arkane Lyon, Marvel’s Blade is a mature, single-player, third-person game set in the heart of Paris, now in development in collaboration with Marvel Games.

name: Jurassic Park: Survival
description: Survive thrilling first-person action as InGen scientist Dr. Maya Joshi, who was unable to evacuate Isla Nublar, in this single-player action-adventure game and discover a never-before-told story. Through thrilling encounters, experience the wonder and danger of dinosaurs, each with their own distinct and adaptive behaviors brought to life by John Hammond’s vision.

name: OD
description: OD explores the concept of testing your fear threshold, and what it means to OD on fear – while blurring the boundaries of gaming and film.

name: Crazy Taxi
description: Innovative and fresh style driving action! Cheerful feeling of freedom x fusion of nature and city. Peel out the new stage of Crazy City!

name: Streets of Rage: Revolution
description: Beloved side-scrolling beat ’em up action series! Take control of one of the ex-officers and make the city a place where people no longer have to walk the “Streets of Rage”!

name: Golden Axe
description: Warriors arise to subdue the demons! Defeat your enemies with a variety of attacks with swords and magic! The legendary story about the battle axe “Golden Axe” is about to begin!

name: Jet Set Radio
description: “Counter-culture”. Tokyo streets open world. Experience the “rebellion” movement that feels free in a suffocating society. Make friends, increase your fans, and create a movement!

name: Kemuri
description: Kemuri summons you into a realm where the unpredictable meets the extraordinary in an urban jungle where mysterious creatures - Yokai- hide amongst the population. Become a Yokai Hunter and use your Fox Window to unravel the mysteries of the city and bring balance to the world. Dive into a thrilling adventure alone or with friends, hunt yokai in style, collect their powers and face even greater challenges.

name: Harmonium: The Musical
description: Harmonium is an interactive sign language musical and adventure/narrative game that follows Melody Macato, an energetic 10-year-old Filipina-American musician who became Deaf at a young age. For her upcoming debut show, she wants to create a new type of music that can be felt, seen, and is accessible to her friends.

name: Pony Island 2: Panda Circus
description: Pony Island 2: Panda Circus is a phantasmagorical voyage through time, myth, divinity, and video games. Escape the lordly deities of the underworld with your soul, and your sanity, intact. This is not a game about ponies.

name: Hey Ma I'm a Dragon Now
description: A Single Player 2D Side-Scrolling pixel art Skill-Based Bullet-Hell Game where you kill various enemies and bosses to get coins to upgrade your character so you can beat more enemies and progressed further.

name: Journey of Realm: Dawn Dew
description: "Journey of Realm: Dawn Dew" is a 2D story-based turn-based game developed by an individual. In the game, you will assume the role of "Dew", and encounter a variety of characters, confront the looming threat of the dark beasts, face the ultimate evil, and ultimately fight for goodness and freedom.

name: Lovely Defenders
description: A group of legendary monsters is said to silently invade bedrooms while girls are fast asleep, stealthily stealing their precious belongings. As the commander, you will assist the girls in reclaiming these stolen items!

name: Warehouse Seduction
description: Warehouse Seduction is a warehouse worker simulator blended with a VN full of sexy and adult content renders and animations.

name: Love, in Debt!?
description: Love, In Debt!? is a romance simulation game. You once had a beautiful relationship, but overnight you were fired, cheated on, and even got yourself in a huge debt! In order to survive, all you can do is work tirelessly! But why does it seem like you became a chick magnet after you're in debt?

name: Lotus Simulator: Citybus Hamburg
description: Take over bus route 172 in Hamburg, Germany. Set in 2005 with authentic low floor transit bus models, realistic buildings and streets and 1100 unique scenery objects. Also included in this Lotus Simulator DLC: new AI vehicles and vegetation.

name: Timeout Bistro
description: The player be a store manager and runs a bistro. He could design the daily menu and create the perfect marriage between the wine and food.

name: Whispers of the Sands
description: Survive a unforgiving desert, hear the whispers of the sands and find sanctuary in caves. Through meditation, unlock an inner world to explore and gain insights and abilities.

name: Space Frontier
description: As a space refugee, you finally found a planet with environment suitable to settle. Craft equipments and build a settlement for you and your group. Craft, build, and supply to survive in the space.

name: To the Hall of the Mountain King
description: 3D hack and slash platforming action adventure in which your mission is to rescue your cat and carry out a coup against the king who ordered cat's abduction.

name: Escape the Super Nerdy Dungeon: W100 Master Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Backrooms
description: The Backrooms is an Online Co-Op experience with friends, dynamic levels, and proximity voice chat. Every second week new level will be added! Or create your own levels with the in-game level editor! Face the unknown together, communicating strategically in this immersive and chilling adventure.

name: Moratorium: Don’t Beat This Game
description: Sin descripción

name: Fluffwatch
description: Fluffwatch is a time management, casual, and, cozy game about taking care of a herd of sheep during cozy day and defending them during stressful night from hungry wolves. Make wonderful connections with the animals you take care of and let nothing take them away from you!

name: The Phoenix Protocol
description: The Phoenix Protocol is an action-roguelike game set in a cyberpunk world that is easy to learn but hard to master with a focus on complex mechanics with a lot of depth.

name: Sanity's Shroud
description: Sanity's Shroud, a first person survival horror experience tailored to your fears.

name: A Kingdom to Conquer
description: A Kingdom to Conquer is 2D tactical action RPG where you play as a weak monster, clawing your way up the food chain. Do what you must to survive. Fight. Bargain. Run. Evolve, lead armies, raid monasteries and conquer kingdoms...

name: Gallery Night Shift
description: Work the night shift with your friends at a gallery where the art wants to kill you.

name: The Dabloon Project
description: An Exploration/Adventure game set in a procedural map. Fight, Explore, and Build to become comfortable with your Dabloon fortune.

name: More Orke
description: Orc-themed idle war game. Use planning and wit to grow your empire and eradicate all who stand in your way!

name: Don't Press A to Jump
description: An endless runner for the Playdate console

name: Deep Dive Duet
description: You and your partner find yourself deep underwater in a sinking submarine. Your goal is to swim as far as possible. Stay on course, repair holes, don't let electrical wires fall into the water and try not to die in a closed, flooded compartment.

name: Super Cloud Fight
description: Super Cloud Fight elevates aerial combat to new heights! Engage in thrilling dogfights, unleash epic maneuvers from your biplane in a sky-bound battleground. Dive into clouds for cover, seize power-ups, and dominate the skies to become the ultimate airborne champion!

name: Beyond the Curtains
description: "Beyound the Curtains" is a tranquil and relaxing game of casually gazing out the window, longing to witness interesting events and surprises. Additionally, the interior of the room will change over time, which may reveal some personal information about the one viewing through the window...?

name: Ectoplasm
description: Step into the chilling world of paranormal investigation. Gather crucial information from a haunted location using specialized equipment, all while staying one step ahead of the ghost. Experience the psychological horror alone or in a team of up to 4 players.

name: Sling-A-Thing
description: Sling-A-Thing is a mind-boggling comedy action puzzler. Throw and transform into an extreme variety of cartoon characters and objects to find your way to the exit.

name: SligStorm
description: Sin descripción

name: Disney Dreamlight Valley: A Rift in Time - Chapter 3: Treasures of Time
description: The last of 3 chapters of the "A Rift in Time" expansion pack for Disney Dreamlight Valley. Foil Jafar's schemes and fix the rift in time.

name: Pro-Am 64
description: Pro-Am 64 is the name of a cancelled game by Rare, intended to be part of the Pro-Am series. It was presented to Nintendo after which it was later reworked into Diddy Kong Racing.

name: Mist Sequence
description: Players will play the role of an investigator under the "Fog Investigation Team" and are ordered to explore the continent shrouded in thick fog by airship. Players need to lead investigators with different personalities and abilities to fight against visions and monsters from the fog and find out the truth behind the fog.

name: Heroes of Fortune
description:
Heroes of Fortune is a competitive, multiplayer party game on mobile. Four players raid dungeons together to see who can emerge with the largest fortune.

Simple choices with exciting consequences - do you risk danger for bigger rewards, or play it safe and bank your treasure?

name: Starlight River
description:
Starlight River features stunning and unique multi-phase bosses, challenging encounters, tons of unique weapons for every class, a dynamic and in-depth approach to buildcrafting, and tons of secrets.
Will you walk the path countless shattered civilizations left behind? Will you harness the energies that destroyed them? Will you claim Starlight and make it your own? Will you find the Armillary? Will you unravel the weave of fate? Or will you be forgotten, lost in the space between constellations?

name: Project Shaolin
description:
"Project Shaolin" is an unannounced, third-person melee-oriented RPG complete with four-player co-op. The game was also said to heavily involve the Wu-Tang Clan members themselves with the game’s soundtrack and would feature the likes of loot, weapons, and gear from defeated enemies. According to the reports, the game is in development at Brass Lion Entertainment, a new studio formed in 2019 by Manveer Heir.

The gameplay evolves around fast-paced melee combat in third-person, with a strong focus on having both music and combat intertwined. Players can choose from four different weapons that all have different and unique playstyles (single swords, dual swords, etc.). It’s understood that the game features a massive catalog of the Wu-Tang Clan’s music, most of which has been re-imagined by producer and DJ Just Blaze for the game.

name: Taiko Frenzy: Mixed Reality Update
description: Introducing a new passthrough feature.

name: Silent North
description: Silent North thrusts you into the Swiss Alps, battling the elements, Infected, and other players. Fight solo or team up, scavenging gear and essentials. Intense PVPVE action ensures constant danger. Adapt, be resilient, and survive in this unpredictable, ever-changing landscape.

name: Survival Nation: Map Expansion Update
description: Sin descripción

name: Defy
description:
Descend into terror in DEFY, an immersive first-person horror game set within a surreal liminal world. Unspeakable creatures use their raw senses, alongside cutting-edge AI, to hunt you through the ever evolving darkness. Engage in heart-pounding physics-based combat against vicious abominations using brutal melee weapons and powerful firearms. Built exclusively for VR, in DEFY, you must use both your wits and weapons to survive.

It’s your personal odyssey as you embark on a desperate battle towards freedom, against unspeakable monstrosities. CAN YOU SURVIVE?

name: Voyagers of Nera
description: Voyagers of Nera is a cooperative seafaring survival-crafting game for up to 10 players. Sail across a magical ocean world, skim along the waves, and protect lost nature spirits from monsters emerging from the depths.

name: Combo Devils
description: Combo Devils is an evolution of the platform-fighting genre. Stylish combat, and a cooperative roguelite mode offers content for all player skill levels. An experience that balances accessibility with a high execution ceiling for a dedicated core player base to grow around.

name: Nirvana Noir
description:
Nirvana Noir, the sequel to 2021's "Genesis Noir," is a cosmic adventure beyond time and space. Become your own existential threat and put out the fires of eternity.

Dual noir adventures beyond time and space; one where the Big Bang was never fired, the other an explosion of color and sin. Your new lover is tangled in rumors of a Bigger Bang. Can you unravel its mystery and stop the threat to the cosmic city?

Hit the street; counter the culture; be changed.

name: Vivarium
description: You wake up and find yourself in an enormous terrarium. Explore, meet characters, and grow your escape - and along the way, uncover the mysteries of the terrarium as well. Vivarium is an adventure game about finding where you belong while surviving in a familiar yet alien environment.

name: The Mermaid Mask
description: Magnus Mortuga has been killed. The captain of the world's strangest submarine, he was found in a locked room with an ancient stone cauldron - unsealed and opened for the first time. How did he die? Was it a curse? Perhaps one of his eccentric crew? Or does the bizarre truth run even deeper...

name: FireFront
description:
FireFront is a free to play mobile shooter game featuring:
- Large-scale multiplayer combat with a focus on teamwork (64 players per match).
- Ground vehicles, helicopters & infantry.
- 2 game modes + 2 maps at launch & more to follow soon thereafter.
- More realistic graphics, smoother movement and more satisfying gunplay than the best mobile shooter games.
- More mature gameplay mechanics (high recoil, no aim assist, voice chat for teamwork, etc).

name: Loose Leaf
description: Manage a tea room between worlds with the most in-depth tea brewing simulation ever. Experiment with ingredients and tools to find the best recipes for serving your haunted guests. Then read their fortune in the cards to help ease their worries. Will you become a true Tea Master?

name: All Demons Go to Heaven
description: We will follow the story of Samwell, an orphan guy, innocent and shy and without any friends, who until now has been constantly bullied by his caretaker Charlotte. On the other hand, we have Grynesha, a succubus who fled from the Demon World and came to the Human World, with one goal in mind, to be able to recover her home from who took it from her. These two characters will become inseparable, Grynesha will offer Samwell a life of all that he deserves, full of lust and power, but in return, she will use Samwell for her benefit. With Grynesha's ability to create lewd situations, Samwell will be involved in many circumstances with different girls that he will meet on his adventure.​

name: Kameo: Elements of Power
description: The unreleased version of Kameo: Elements of Power for the N64, Nintendo GameCube, and later the Xbox.

name: The Art of Reflection
description: The Art of Reflection is a first-person puzzle game where you traverse mirrors as if they were natural extensions of space. Solve puzzles, uncover secrets, and perform gravity-shifting acrobatics through a sprawling environment as you learn to navigate this world with mastery.

name: Street Fighter
description: An unreleased NES version of the 1987 Arcade game Street Fighter.

name: Oddworld: Munch’s Exoddus
description: A cancelled follow up to Munch’s Oddysee that would’ve been the second game outside the main quintology. The story would’ve had Munch with the last can of Gabbiar that he got hold of in the good ending of Munch’s Oddysee venture out to the Ma Spa where the Gabbit eggs would be fertilised and hatched into Gabbiwongs, of which would then begin their life cycle to save the Gabbit race from extinction.

name: Epic Donald
description: A follow up to the Epic Mickey series which would have featured Donald Duck and elements from the Carl Barks comics. The game was cancelled after the dismal failure of Epic Mickey 2 and the switch to focus on the mobile gaming market.

name: Diablo
description: A cancelled Game Boy version of the Playstation game Diablo. Why it was cancelled is unknown, but a tech demo was produced and never shown to the public.

name: There is Not Really A Name for This Game
description: Sin descripción

name: SpecFreq
description: SpecFreq is an online multiplayer isometric shooter set in a dynamic and immersive modern battlefield.

name: The Lost Nomad
description: The Lost Nomad is role-playing game (RPG) and (survival system) that made by one solo developer. with an engaging building system and resource management mechanics, chose your own path in the shattered lands.

name: Drop Command
description: The year is 2647. War rages 150 light years from Earth. Pilot Mechs, Tanks, Infantry and Aircraft in combined arms combat on many worlds across the star cluster. Play as a lone wolf, or rise in rank to manage and lead entire battalions into combat throughout a procedural campaign.

name: Timekeepers Defense
description: Defend your time machine in this unique take on roguelite tower defense gameplay. Travel through the ages to recruit fighters and mount advanced defenses, in a handful of challenging gamemodes. Unlock new Timekeepers, and push your builds to the limit in the face of endless onslaughts.

name: CrossNotes
description: This game is completely free. a multiplayer game, which mainly includes a chaotic battle of works that the game creator likes.

name: Matr1x Fire
description:
Matr1x FIRE is the first mobile shooting game in Metaverse. Players can fight in Metaverse while owning their own NFT assets. Let’s Play and Own!

Our product focuses on PVP multiplayer fair competition, while providing strategic casual PVE gameplay modes, including classic 5V5 battles, Battle Royale and so on. Beside rich gameplay modes, our product also provides various maps, weapons, and avatars, which players can team up with friends to experience.

name: God Of This World
description: What if classic RPGs were modern day 3D top-down shooters? You'll collect bullets, health, keys, unlock doors, destroy enemy portals, all while shooting at enemy robots who are non-stop seeking you. Make it to the boss of each level, as they get progressively harder.

name: Kingdom of Doom
description: This is an adventure RPG with a focus on boss battles, defeating powerful enemies and gaining lots of equipment rewards. With different equipment to enhance yourself, challenge more powerful bosses and uncover the secrets of this fantasy world.

name: Dark Samurai
description: Dark Samurai is a roguelike horde survival game with permanent progression, a persistent open world, quests, and online co-op, set in feudal Japan overrun by demons.

name: Farmer's Dynasty 2
description: An idyllic farm surrounded by picturesque landscapes. Embrace the seasons to build, farm and feel the country life in the open game world of Farmer's Dynasty 2. Inherit the family farm as the next generation to prosper and create a farming legacy.

name: Sea Of Rifts
description:
A naval RPG that combines a rogue-like with the simulation of a story generator. Assemble a crew of randomly generated misfits and explore the dangerous Rifts tearing this hostile ocean apart.

Assemble a motley crew of misfits and venture into a hostile ocean to make your fortune, and tell your own story as you enter the dangerous Rifts tearing this world apart.

name: Our Journey
description: Our journey is a co-op roguelite asymmetric communication game. Observe, then communicate to your playmate the right path by associating symbols to the environment. Game after game, use your creativity to build complicity with your playmate to explore further and further and unlock new ways to play.

name: Curse of Elmwood
description: A folklore-inspired, eerie action-adventure dungeon crawler about preventing a curse that requires your blood to complete. Master your weapon, explore a world brimming with items, abilities, and spells, and ensure that endless night never befalls your hometown of Elmwood.

name: Sentinels Inc.
description: Sentinels Inc is the first full tag team platform fighting game. Enjoy new mechanics in a familiar genre with an original cast, fast-paced gameplay and exciting online multiplayer combat.

name: Rocket League: Whiplash
description: Rifting over for the world of Fortnite comes the Whiplash.

name: Daymare Town
description: Daymare Town is a hand-drawn puzzle adventure game. You find yourself in a heart of a strange city populated by peculiar Metamorph creatures. This town is full of nooks and crannies, puzzles, secrets and items to collect to help you along the way. Can you escape the nightmare of a day?

name: Easter Egg Bundle
description: Sin descripción

name: A Brand New Camera
description: Sin descripción

name: Neptunia Game Maker R:Evolution - Day One Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: King Bundle
description: Sin descripción

name: Snow Racer 98
description: Sin descripción

name: Tsutawaru! Manaberu! Nyanko Manga de Eikaiwa
description: Sin descripción

name: Abarehateta Byouin kara no Dasshutsu
description: Sin descripción

name: Momo no Hana ha Senketsu ni Somaru
description: Sin descripción

name: Anime Puzzle School Trouble
description: Sin descripción

name: Brain Memory: Magnificent Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Tetsudou Nippon! Real Pro Tokkyuu Romance Car! Odakyu Dentetsu-hen
description: Sin descripción

name: Anime Girls: Special Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Anime Paradise: Extended Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Brawl Chess: Extended Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Crossout: Barghest
description: Sin descripción

name: Paddles
description: When all you have is a paddle, everything looks like a brick.

name: Bassmaster Fishing 2022: Retro Cosmetic Pack Season Pass
description: Sin descripción

name: Campfire Cozy Friends
description: Campfire Cozy Friends is a new & different type of game, built around a cast of colorful AI characters who you can talk to about... anything! With a completely open ended dialog experience, players can sculpt the story & gameplay in unique ways!

name: Christmas Wonderland Collectors Edition
description: A relaxing hidden object game for the festive season.

name: Epic World: Hunt For Quest
description: Epic World is a Platformer action game with tricky elements, hidden treasures and dangerous enemies. You become an adventurer exploring a continuously evolving levels to recapture the stolen gold from the orcs king.

name: My Pet Hooligan: Ugly Christmas Sweater Pack
description: Bring on the Mistletoe & Mayhem! Ugly Christmas Sweaters are here to eliminate your enemies in style!

name: My Pet Hooligan: Mall Santa Pack
description: Tis the Season to destroy all those Hooligans on your on the naughty list.

name: OpenSeason
description:
Fractional Uprising Studios presents a third person shooter pinning various NFT communities against each other in a multiplayer battle royale.

You will need to hold a Fractional Uprising Studios Membership to play this game and other productions.

name: Outfield
description: Outfield is a horror/puzzle game in which you are trapped in a mysterious field of tall grass. Solve the puzzles, discover the secrets of the tall grass and survive the danger around you to hope to survive.

name: RhythmicTypeX
description: RhythmicTypeX is an adaptive rhythm game designed to develop typing virtuosity on the keyboard, based on musical rhythmic training techniques used by professional musicians around the world. The game play is designed to easily train with the 10 fingers typing method in a fun way.

name: TrekkingAndCamping
description: Trekking and Camping is a climbing-themed walking simulation game that tells the daily adventures of the protagonist named Allen.

name: Train Sim World 4: Maintalbahn: Aschaffenburg - Miltenberg Route Add-On
description: Return to the portside town of Aschaffenburg, Germany and embark on Regionalbahn services along the Main Valley. No wires, no fuss, your next adventure awaits aboard the sleek DB BR 642 DMU, wind your way to Miltenberg in Train Sim World 4: Maintalbahn!

name: Ordinem
description: Ordinem is a new trading card game that builds upon the best battle card games in the market. Players will utilise cards from each each of the 5 'orders' of magic to cast spells, summon followers, craft magical artefacts and weave enchantments to defeat other players.

name: FoxFire Mine
description: Embark on 'Foxfire Mine,' a 2D roguelike digging quest. Unearth valuable gems, manage resources, and navigate strategic upgrades for survival. Every descent challenges your tactics and adaptability in a dynamic underground world.

name: Forest of Soul
description: ”Forest of Soul“ is a role-playing game that allows you to enter your own spiritual world and discover wonderful scenes. Follow a young girl looking for herself and direction, solve various meaningful mysteries, and experience a touching story. Let’s start this relaxing and comfortable journey!

name: Emerald Caravan
description: An economy-roguelite game with rpg elements and a rich narrative. Embark on an epic journey through treacherous dungeons and lead your trading caravan to shape your own destiny.

name: Eon of the Green: Area Crescent
description: A secret scientific research program sends your mind one billion years into the future, to Eon of the Green. Live up to your quests as xenobiologist, explore unknown organisms and understand how they work together to save the most precious: life itself.

name: Dark Laws
description: Dark Laws is a third-person medieval fantasy extraction looter (PvPvE), where you combat with melee, ranged weapons and spells. Choose one of 9 mercenaries, mount a Dragon alone or with a friend and survive the brutality of enemies on Telos Island.

name: Momento
description: Journey through a life where the objects you choose to keep influence the life you lead. A cozy room decorator with whimsical settings; relaxing gameplay; and charming branching narratives, Momento will be a warm ode to the challenge of following your dreams down the winding road of life.

name: Metaforces Bowling Center
description: Join your friends at the Metaforces Bowling Center to play bowling. Very fun multiplayer experience! You can take practice shots or play a full game with your friends and see who is the best. Aim, power and shoot!

name: Medicevil
description: Can a cure be found for the plague, or can humanity live with it? Even if found, should there be a price, and if so, who should pay it? On the road to tomorrow, are those bringing healing the friends I should join hands with, or are they rivals for a future I can hold in my hands?

name: Map Map: A Game About Maps
description: Embark on a cozy treasure hunt as cartographer of an adventure crew. Use your sense of direction to make maps, help your companions and explore idyllic islands.

name: Sharded World: Backpack Adventure
description: Sharded World: Backpack Adventure is an exciting and strategic game that will allow you to show your strategic and creative skills. In it you will have to build your own backpack, buy equipment, improve it and use it to defeat your opponents in exciting duels.

name: School Hero
description: Save your school in the thrilling maze chase game, "School Hero." Eat bots, deploy special weapons, and challenge friends in multiplayer mode. Available on Steam Deck for gaming on the go!

name: Overhills
description: Immerse yourself in Overhills, a world inspired by Slavic folklore! Explore ever-changing biomes, engage in dynamic combat, craft uniquely, and enjoy chill survival. A new story awaits you around every corner. Ready for adventure?

name: Outer Factory
description: Outer Factory is a peaceful and minimalist simulation where you design automated factories on different planets. Create complex infrastructures with simplified building mechanics. Enjoy your work as an interplanetary automation expert.

name: The Hiker
description: Photograph the animals and learn about them and their environment.Find the right moment to take a photo of the animals you find. No rush, take this walk at your own pace.Talk to your contacts through your mobile and thus advance the story. Make your own decisions.

name: The Andesia Project
description: Investigate a disturbed solar system in this short, first person horror exploration experience.

name: Twins of Olus
description: Embark on a perilous journey throughout the lands of Olus with the warrior Lions and his spectral twin Creo. Fulfill their vow to protect each other from the vile forces determined to split them apart in this isometric action adventure game where working together is the key to survival.

name: Twilight Story: A Quiet House
description: Twilight Story a Quiet House is short first person psicological horror game when you play a role of sherif who come to town to investigate a missing girl. You have to solve puzzles ,find items and explorer dark ambient.

name: Pokémon Nightmare Version: Invasion
description:
Overnight, the world lost its connection to Azure City. It seems as if all citizens disappeared in a matter of hours. The public is scared of whatever happened. A terrorist attack? A failed experiment of the GENE Company? Or maybe aliens?

A team of policemen go to Azure City. Only 4 of them come back after realizing that they can't find their colleagues. The investigation posed more questions than answers.

After a month of silence, a young investigator named Jack heads for Azure City. His goal is to solve the case once and for all, no matter what it takes. Why is he trying to accomplish what a team of policemen failed to do? Why is he risking his life for such a feared case? Is he going to make it out alive?

name: Inzoi
description: Inzoi is a life simulation game where players become gods within the game, allowing them to change everything as they wish and experience endless new stories in various forms of life.

name: Homeworld 3: Fleet Command Edition
description: Homeworld 3: Fleet Command edition includes the base game, the Year One Pass, Multiplayer Customization Set, Digital Soundtrack & unlocks access to play 72 hours early.

name: Homeworld 3: Deluxe Edition
description: Homeworld 3 Deluxe Edition includes Base Game and Year One Pass. The Year One Pass includes three DLC drops that expand the co-op War Games mode with new playable factions and artifacts.

name: Elementals Beta
description: Elementals Beta is a multiplayer roleplay game where you harness the elements of the universe to defeat fearsome enemies and friends.

name: Skyts
description: Have you always dreamed of diving into a world where your creativity and strategic skills are the key to success? Welcome to Skyts, the 2D fighting game that puts your imagination first!

name: Ultros: Deluxe Edition
description: Ultros: Deluxe Edition

name: Zi
description: Zi - is a classical casual arcade battle tanks shooter, with realistic 3d physics engine, smart (AI-like) enemies, 'bosses' and map editor.

name: Escape Room Mega Bundle
description:
Five escape rooms developed by mc2games included!
Wizardry School, Palindrome Syndrome, Tested on Humans, Between Time and Regular Factory.

name: Stone Age
description: An action game where you command and fight primitive people!

name: Rabbit Rabbit UFO
description: Sin descripción

name: Car Parking & Car Driving Simulator 2024
description: Sin descripción

name: Loop
description: Loop is a puzzle-platform game where you can co-op with your past self through clones that simulate your actions.

name: Ghost Eater
description: third person action RPG with manga inspired graphics

name: Where's Fido?
description: From the creators of Search & Find - Hidden Objects, Where’s Fido is a relaxing 3D hidden objects journey, where you will be searching and finding lost dogs all around the world.

name: Greed Realm: Hero from Another World & the Soul Tree
description: This is an RPG strategy adventure game that incorporates tabletop game elements and uses card construction as the main gameplay.

name: Monti: The Hidden Secret
description: Monti: The Hidden Secret is an action-advanture game set in the world of "Parala" follow her to the journey to find her destiny. Will she uncover the secret of the world?

name: Reach to Tsukuyomi
description: ”Reach to Tsukuyomi" is an exhilarating short 2D action game on a 2D platform. Fight a variety of enemies, powerful bosses, and free your hometown from Yokai in this simple action game. What awaits you at the end of the story, which unfolds in cute dots, can be found at .......

name: Wolf Knight Memoir
description: Take command of the Wolf Knight to help him remember his dramatic past life through a story driven adventure and test your skills in this challenging Metroidvania game with die and retry platforming features happening in the fantastic 2D hand drawned world of Aurora.

name: Lost Harmony
description: Unwind with Lost Harmony, a cozy solar-punk game where you embody a bird soaring through the skies. Explore a beautiful world, Interact with charming animals and Discover the stories humans left behind.

name: Relic Arena
description: Relic Arena is a roguelike autobattler by Jenkins & SUNSfan for PC/Mobile. Players equip units with historical relics and are led by renowned figures from history. Each relic grants a unit a unique ability, with powerful roguelike upgrades.

name: Lily Fantasia
description: Welcome, to the fantastical and rhythmic world of Lily Fantasia! Join the mysterious vampire, Lily, in a race against time to save your sickened mother. Overcome fierce enemies, wield the magical piano, and become the Rhythm Master you were always destined to!

name: Ink of Fate
description: Explore the world of books, discover its secrets and collect every page in Ink of Fate. A narrative 3D puzzle game in which you will help Helena, a half elf who embarks on a journey to rewrite her destiny and avoid the tragic end imposed on her by her author.

name: Neon Goddess
description: Explore a cyberpunk world filled with cosmic horrors as Astrid, a mercenary, confronts the moral dilemmas of this dystopian reality. Your choices shape the destiny in this retro 3D horror game.

name: Don't Be Sus
description: Don't Be Sus is an immersive first-person action game that lets you explore a beautiful historical town and discover its dark mysteries. Meet whacky characters, eat at restaurants, drink at bars, learn about the local history, find your way into restricted areas and investigate!

name: Boom! Buster
description: An adrenaline rush is part of a balanced breakfast. Boom! Buster keeps you on your toes with fast paced panic inducing gameplay featuring an over-the-top cartoony art style and soundtrack reminiscent of the early 2000s.

name: Zegelon: Hardcore Arena
description: Zegelon: Hardcore Arena is a fast-paced competitive multiplayer survival game that offers a strategic battle royale hack & slash experience, where players compete in brutal gladiatorial combat for gold and glory, with no second chances.

name: Wild's Edge
description: You've set up camp at the place where civilization turns into unexplored wilderness. Can you brave the ruthless hinterland to defeat each biome?

name: Rabbit Hole
description: Rabbit Hole is an upcoming story-driven - RPG filled with psychological cosmic horrors and then then tightly wrapped in the wackiness of Alice in Wonderland.

name: Volunteers
description: Are you ready? You are VOLUNTEERS! You are part of an experiment! Fight, survive and either WIN or LOSE, all of this is up to you and your team. In this fast-paced multiplayer fps, you will have to try to find your way to the victory.

name: Nomad Defender
description: How many tries will it take to get back our land? Enter the Kernel - defense simulation to protect the Wirelands. Fight roguelike strategic Tower Defense battles. Upgrade and customize your Turret deck with unique synergies and countless combinations. Do you have what it takes to reach the end?

name: Horror Cam
description: Embark on a thrilling adventure of observation and vigilance in a unique puzzle game. Your task is to closely scrutinize recorded security camera feeds, identifying and rectifying discrepancies. Hone your keen observational skills and strong recall abilities to endure until dawn.

name: Meanwhile in Sector 80
description: As an engineer stranded in an alien star system, scavenge parts and build equipment to fight your way back home. Work with (or against) the laws of physics in Meanwhile in Sector 80 to turn trash into survival.

name: Grave Desecrator
description: new in town ready to work in this society that you dont belong, start working as a cemetery watchman discover the tradition of this place, carry yours , learn about the dead ones,experiance emotions that you thought you werent capable...

name: Unrivaled Heroes
description: Prepare your 2.5 D beat 'em up side scroller battle for a challenging adventure in medieval aesthetic folklore, where players can learn ancient martial art skills in a progression chapter story to experience the true adrenaline rush from mythical heroes!

name: Lottery Winner
description: Lottery Winner is a simulation game that reflect lottery games in real life. You can buy as much lottery as you want to examine your lottery theory or just your luck.

name: Project MW
description: "Project MW" is a turn-based RPG game set in a pixelated fantasy world. With the protagonist's team and various other factions in the mix, countless humans flock to the magical mountain, vying for the power to conquer the world.

name: Mono-Space
description: Trapped within a geometrical and mono-chromatic dimension; you stumble upon the "Heart of Corollorum", allowing you to manipulate the colors and objects of the dimension to your will. Can you escape the dimension in one piece in this genre-defying experimental puzzle platformer?

name: Cartridge Monsters: Rebirth
description: Embark on your quest to hunt and capture over 100 powerful Ammons. Uncover your half-ammon, half-human abilities, challenge the Belmonte family's reign, and shape the destiny of the Phantom Island.

name: Dreamshot Fantasia
description: Dive into a fantastical adventure that combines strategic tile-matching puzzle gameplay with authentic 80s anime charm!

name: The Phantom Forest
description: Embark on a perilous journey through the haunting Phantom Forest, where survival meets souls-like combat in an open-world adventure. Face nightmarish creatures, build thriving settlements, and unravel the mysteries of a malevolent force.

name: Star Crystal Warriors Go!
description: When nightmare monsters invade your city’s dreams, will you heal them with compassion or destroy them with magic? Defeat evil in this magical girl anime!

name: The Shaft
description: Mine ore for the federation, kill monsters in dark caves, protect yourself from radiation, but most importantly, DON'T DIE. Dark caves conceal horrifying abominations. Sell the extracted ore at the safe house and buy new equipment and upgrade your unique weapons.

name: Project Paws
description: Project Paws is a purr-fectly paced cooperative adventure that will put your stealth and puzzle-solving skills to the ultimate test as you attempt the most daring heist of all

name: Family Adventures Paris
description: Join Family Adventures Paris and be part of an incredible journey! Meet the Millers, loving parents Peter and Emily, talented Jessica, and sporty Steven - as they travel to the French capital, exploring the beautiful streets and experiencing the culture, art, and history that Paris holds for them.

name: Hentai: Police Force
description: Embark on an exciting adventure in the vast, sun-soaked landscapes of Hentai: Police Force. As a daring detective in this unique open-world experience, your mission is to locate and interact with three distinct members of the Anime Police Force scattered throughout a sprawling desert city!

name: Granite Casket
description: Granite Casket is a claustrophobic horror about crawling with six degrees of freedom through caverns. Careful positioning and awkward angles will be needed to find the crevices within the earth no human was ever designed to go.

name: Tales from Hazelwood Post
description: When your grandmother falls ill, you return to Hazelwood and unwittingly take over as the new Post Master at the small, dusty post office on the square. The only problem, this town has no street names or addresses. In this cosy puzzle game, solve puzzles, deliver the mail, and reconnect the town.

name: Degenheim
description: Dive into a world gone limitlessly mad and slash your way out through hordes of enemies in an action-packed isometric rogue-lite title, where every run offers a unique experience and challenge.

description: A narrative role-playing game with Point'n'click elements, where every choice will have consequences. Set priorities correctly. It's up to you to decide what is really important and what can be sacrificed. Principles, friends, loved ones, own well-being. Bets are made! There are no more bets!

description: In a world where coins can be tossed to generate resources, win more coins, customize higher-yielding  piggy banks, and reveal the secrets of "money begets money" along the way

name: Shelf

name: Impossible Road 2
description: A pure, minimal arcade game about risk, reward, and rollercoasters. Hurtle down the track at breakneck speeds in search of the perfect line. Earn mutations to change the game in surprising ways, and mix and match them to create your own unique challenges. Sequel to the award-winning classic.

name: Captain Hardcore

name: Shrines of Power
description: Dive into the magic-infused world of Shrines of Power, a fast-paced FPS where strategic mastery and mystical abilities collide. Protect your shrines, outsmart your foes, and experience thrilling battles across unique maps. Unleash your dominance in this captivating blend of action and strategy.

name: Mr Flippers Out For Vengeance
description: Slap your way through rooms of enemies and explore an unusual castle while trying to rescue your captured wife and take vengeance on the one who took her.

name: Mechanical Tralp
description: Mechanical Trap is a 2D horizontal tower defense game with gravity effects, with a variety of defense towers to collect and use together, a rich map, each enemy has a different way of restraining, and each defense tower has a different function.It's challenging. Do you dare to accept the challenge?

name: Host Security Guard
description: To save them and bring back our peaceful life. He deicides to become the "Host".

name: The Artifacts of Marvelous Birds
description:
Finally, after 10 years of working on this project, exit1337 is able to present the 3rd (and last) demo of The artifacts of marvelous birds - or short: Taomb

Expect a mysterious adventure through tropical islands, dubious fields, haunted forests and icy areas.
Please keep in mind that the first two worlds are really old, though some parts of levels have been revamped. The great quality of this hack definitely lies within later worlds, so don't quit too soon!
This hack starts out really easy, but gets harder and harder as you progress. World 4 and 5 do get challenging.

name: Arena of Taryon
description: Arena of Taryon is a classic pixel roguelike experience with an immersive story and fun, challenging gameplay! Want to focus on the lore and discover the secrets of our world? Or do you prefer combat and action over dialogue? The choice is yours and you may pick both!

name: Kingdom of Cards
description: Kingdom of Cards is a hybrid roleplay simulation game. With different focuses, each playthrough is different and is affected by the citizens of the town, and events to come, along with the depth of economy, cards, exploration, roles and events. There is much to learn, and much to master. With online play being implemented in 2023, the game is played both offline and online and take part to compete to succeed in a harsh world.

name: Drowned Lake
description: Dredge up the secrets hidden beneath Drowned Lake in this horror fishing adventure. Investigate the dark waters to fish out the truth. Catch evidence. Do not get caught yourself.

name: DarkwebStreamer
description: You? An occult streamer on an alternate 90s internet. Your goal? Become #1. The problem? The supernatural is REAL. Manage your stream, do weird rituals, make weird friends and experience a different story every time in this procedurally-generated psycho-horror RPG streaming sim.

name: Dwarf Fortress: Adventure Mode
description:
Adventure Mode is the RPG mode of Dwarf Fortress, where you can create a character and freely roam the rich simulated world you have made a home in during your Fortress Mode save or start fresh in a newly generated world.
Adventure Mode holds limitless possibilities for player stories: Write a poem and recite it in front of unsuspecting tavern-goers, join the group of hearth warriors of a local village to solve local problems, rob a tomb and become cursed by a mummy. This and so much more!

name: Last Train Home: Digital Deluxe Edition

name: Treat Maze
description: He's so angry...

name: Beat 'N' Path
description: Combine creativity and logic to create machines… that create music! Take on exciting challenges in Career Mode, or experiment in Sandbox Mode.

name: Brain Urge
description: Brain Urge is a real-time strategy game where you attack a human base on the side of zombies. The human base is reliably defended by military equipment, and at the sight of zombies. Plan your attack carefully, use the capabilities of several types of zombies and strive to defeat all of humanity.

name: Bullwagon Business
description: Smash the reins and set off in a bull-drawn wagon to explore the beautiful countryside, have adventures, but most of all, trade. But don't expect it to be easy. There are bandits and other vermin everywhere, and if you don't fight them off, you'll lose them! Get in!

name: Cosmic Horizons: Path of the Wanderer
description: Cosmic Horizons is a third-person, story rich adventure game. You play as Ethan Nelson, a seemingly ordinary man, whose faith is about to change. You must embark on a journey, that will require every skill you possess in order to save your life, and just maybe, reunite with your best friend.

name: Cosmic Rollers: Orbital Odyssey
description: Embark on an infinite, thrilling journey through the depths of space in Cosmic Rollers Orbital Odyssey! Navigate a mesmerizing golden transparent trail as you roll your boulder through the cosmic expanse, dodging other boulders in a challenging and never-ending adventure.

name: Magic Scroll
description: Magic Scroll is an addictive game based on physics and destruction. You have to destroy various structures with a pickaxe! In the game you will find many exciting and exciting levels of varying difficulty. Control your pickaxe and destroy everyone on your way!

name: Metal Rampage Uprising
description: Metal Rampage: Uprising is a 2D platformer with puzzle elements. Plunge into the exciting world of the future, where humanity is in danger from an army of destructive robots. You, in the role of a highly effective combat robot, have become humanity's last hope for salvation.

name: Into The G.R.I.D.
description: Dive into the neon-lit virtual world as a hacker detective fighting rebellious AI programs, inspired by the "Tron" movie. Unleash hacking skills in a 'Minesweeper'-style game with RPG elements, save the virtual world from chaos while questioning who you are - human or another AI?

name: Mutants & Zombies
description: Mutants & Zombies is a first-person shooter (FPS). A zombie apocalypse has occurred in the world and the survivors have to hide in safe shelters. You have to take on the role of an ordinary tramp and try to survive in this harsh world! Explore dangerous locations, kill zombies and mutants

name: Duplicity Loop
description: A dark magical girl VN that takes place in an Alice in Wonderland inspired world.

name: Grunder
description: Grunder is a 2D platformer with puzzle elements. You will have to go through a series of dangerous locations, each of which presents a new test and challenge for your skills. On your journey you will encounter treacherous enemies. Use your fighting skills to overcome your challenge!

name: Scraptail: Down the Drain
description: Join Vivian, The Rat, on her journey to become the greatest thief The Underground has ever seen. Upgrade your equipment and her bionic tail to help you with all the dangers that fill Sewer City.

name: Shattered Echoes
description: Shattered Echoes is a singleplayer arcade-platformer where your only enemy is yourself. Jump, dash and think two steps ahead in hectic attempts to dodge enemies that copy everything you do. Unlock versatile movement abilities and take on challenging arenas where you must outrun your past.

name: The Mofflys: Invasion Mayhem
description: Embark with your alien team on an epic quest to invade planet Earth and put the universe back into mayhem! Explore 7 iconic Earth regions filled with secrets, a wide variety of targets and defeat Earths biggest bosses on the battlefield.

name: Treasure Dive
description: Grab loot, avoid fish lol

name: Undead: Rise of Betrayed King
description: Undead: Rise of the Betrayed King - is an engaging role-playing game where players, assuming the roles of both a dragon and a human, battle against an awakened ancient evil. The game offers unique capabilities for the dragon to explore the world and engage in battles.

name: Unline
description: Welcome to the Bizarre Kingdom! A place full of strange creatures and places.... Even a colourful world has a dark side, remember that it is you who choose their fate.

name: Urban Massacre
description: Urban Massacre is a zombie horror firt-person shooter where you collect items scattered throughout the town. Be careful because there is only one life and in case of death you will have to start over.

name: ZeroKing
description: Embark on an electrifying journey in Zero King. Engage in intense battles amidst diverse space arenas. Customize your ship and prove your skills in multiplayer battles. Fast-paced action awaits in this cosmic adventure. Join the ranks, carve your legacy, and become legend. Are you ready for liftoff?

name: The Invincible Iron Man: Flight Test
description: Put Iron Man's shooting skills to the test with flying enemies all around him at once. Finally, you get the high score you want. This Marvel oldie is so addicting!!

But the clock is ticking, as the terrible Fog curse has taken root in her lungs. Can she reach the top of the World Pole in time to seek a cure? Or will she be doomed to a horrible, soil-y death??

Play along with ten interactive learning games that teach about mathematics, science, geometry, vocabulary, and more. Tilt the tablet up and down to move and jump in the Turtle Skateboard game. Read the "Mousers Attack!" e-book and enjoy photo activities and two creative games.

name: Bullets Beams and Booty
description: A top-down twin-stick shooter that pays homage to the golden era of arcade classics. With its vibrant 2D retro pixel art style, this game offers a blistering blend of intense shooting action, dynamic combat, and strategic gameplay.

name: Dungeon Re-Delve

name: Frogenlav: Skyward Bound

Take part in exciting trial games while the game is still in creation, determine the game's fate with your feedback, and create dynamic, interactive landscapes.

description: "It's OK to Fail" is a difficult silly physics-based platform game where your ultimate goal is to reach the end in under 15 minutes. Control your arms and your legs to jump and overtake your fails !

name: Insomnia

name: Seth

name: Sephiria

name: Seaside Schemes

Inspired from Teamfight tactics and nothing else, I bring you Fishfight tactics, though I didn't name it that in fear of a lawsuit. Build your team, strategize, out-manoeuvre and out-play to climb the ladder and claim your spot as the goat!

name: Rivandy

name: Voidwalker

description: Sin descripción

name: Ablight
description: Ablight is a classic real-time strategy game set in an alternate universe where dieselpunk, cyberpunk and medieval aesthetics meet. Join the rebellion against the zealotic Inquisition, who have been mankinds scourge for hundreds of years and fight a war for survival. Freedom is within touch!

name: Flow: Syn x Vertue

name: Lazers Hurt
