name: Quantic River
description: Immerse yourself in dystopian urban landscapes, seamlessly blending frenetic action and captivating exploration. Experience cybernetic enhancements, dynamic katana combat, slicing, destruction, hacking, and exploration in Quantic River.

Whether communicating with your musical "Constellator" or uncovering cryptic languages with "The Wheel of Life". Solving mysterious puzzles, adventuring realms, or collecting key story items will put you to the test!

name: Starvin Martian
description: Build your own empire with STARVIN MARTIAN! This farming style game, located on the red planet, will be a fun,

Traverse ethereal courses filled with elemental hazards, master your throws, and uncover the perfect balance between skill and enchantment in this immersive sporting adventure.

description: Utilize the unique power of cacti to obliterate thousands of enemies. Choose your items wisely, build a formidable defense, and conquer the depths of hell with precision and skill. Make the devil fear your presence!

name: Grimdoria
description: Join the world of Grimdoria, a 3D stylized high-fantasy indie MMORPG. Join the Adventurer's guild and work your way up the ranks! Grimdoria is a tribute to the mid-2000s golden era of the genre. Currently under heavy development with the aim to deliver a quality classic MMORPG experience.

name: Gravity Backpack
description: Gravity Backpack is a 2D platformer with puzzle elements. Change the gravity field to make your path easier. Avoid traps or simply overcome them using gravity. Travel on a spaceship avoiding enemy projectiles!

name: Gloomy Island
description: Gloomy Island - the game is a mixture of an adventure game and classic quests. Early in the morning you wake up and receive a letter from a mysterious stranger. The letter contained an address with coordinates unknown to you and a request to find important documents.

name: The DarkCity
description: Prepare for a visceral and heart-pounding fusion between fast-paced hack-and-slash action, platforming, and a first-person shooter. As a fearless inquisitor sent by the church, you must unleash hell on the vampire legions that plague this isolated and obliviated city.

name: Swole Mole
description: A difficult boss rush & beat'em up with tight controls and carefully crafted levels made entirely with traditionally drawn animation on paper. This fair but tough souls like will test you skills against the most wild and creative bosses you've seen

name: Radiant Bricks
description: Classic brick breaker with a twist. Change the color of the paddles to change which bricks you can hit. Part action, part puzzle.

name: Project Quad
description: Embark on an adrenaline-fueled adventure through diverse terrains on your quad! Whether you're racing towards the pinnacle or leisurely exploring uncharted territories.

name: Thieves
description: A multiplayer co-op game (Players vs NPC) horror escape game where the thieves decided to steal a house, but the house owned by a killer.

name: The Iceman
description: The Iceman is an exciting and thrilling game that puts you in the shoes of a character who loves the cold and will stop at nothing to reach the fridge.

name: Worm Game
description: Worm Game is an intense escape mission from the vaults of worm hell, taking you on an increasingly difficult journey to sneak through the heavily guarded gates. Features infinite randomly generated levels, online leaderboards, speed run modes and racing against yourself or online with your friends.

name: Mr. Capital!
description: Mr. Capital! needs all the coins! Every single coin! But there's a problem: he's gotta lug 'em all around... Mr. Capital should buy some pockets! Until then, make your way through the levels and collect all those coins! Will Mr. Capital learn the secret of success? Play and find out!

name: X-Com: From The Ashes
description: The campaign begins with the player having to defend the X-Com base from an assault of the Men in Black. Then you will need to assess the situation and learn how to use the new opportunities. Many aspects of game mechanics and balance have been changed, giving a fresh experience. However, the gameplay and visual design remain in the spirit of the classic 1994 game.

name: Detective Instinct: Farewell, My Beloved
description: A woman vanishes without a trace on a cross-country train. The catch? Nobody on board remembers her ever existing in the first place - nobody, except for you. Uncover the story in this detective ADV/visual novel!

name: Pro Evolution Soccer 6: The Den Patch
description: A whole new patch of the classic football videogame Pro Evolution Soccer 6, made by the Argentinian group: The Den

name: Mesimes PT
description:
You go down an elevator to explore an abandoned underground research station. But something is wrong with those robots in there. Can you survive the horror that awaits you down there?

Mesimes PT is a horror survival game with original characters, location and story developed in the Blender Game Engine.

As main features, you can operate EMP turrets in the cameras. In addition, the game has detailed animations and a PS1 graphics style.

This is a passion project that has been in development for 2 years.

name: Wilford Island
description: Adventure Island ROM Hack themed on diabetes advocate Wilford Brimley

name: Wilford Brimley Battle
description: Sin descripción

name: Elite of Conquerors
description: An independent MMORPG, created by the company "EC Games Studio," Elite of Conquerors is a multiplayer adventure game set in a fantastical world.

name: Rolus in the Outskirts
description:
Living out of a shed in the middle of nowhere, Rolus is always down on his luck. Today his tummy rumbles, but without a cent to his name, he's got to find a way to eat.
Luckily for him, there's a fast-food restaurant right down the street.
He finds himself dumpster diving, looking for any scraps, when suddenly a meteorite comes down from above—crashing into both him and the dumpster!

name: Aqua-Mix
description: A Puyo Puyo-like puzzle game; uses sound effects from Puzzle Bobble.

name: Armored Fox
description: A first-person tank game.

name: Farm Keeper
description: Repeatedly bounce the falling peaches off of the monkey's back and get them to the other side of the screen.

name: Hands of Timber
description: Hands of Timber portrays the journey of a little wooden doll that wakes up inside the mind of its creator. To find her father, she must wander through his memories... the good, the bad, and the incomplete ones...

name: Dionysos Wars
description: Sin descripción

name: Hedenite
description: Hedenite is a hand-painted journey through a scruffy yet cozy, retrofuturistic world. Meet whimsical characters, unravel bureaucratic mazes, test your wits, and hone your observation skills in a game that mixes classic adventure with visual novel-style storytelling.

name: Soul Warden
description: Soul Warden is a deep dungeon-crawling RPG that combines classic roguelike gameplay with a pinch of collect-a-thon progression, plenty of humor, tons of loot, and a build-your-own-dungeon sandbox!

name: Lanternia
description: Lanternia is a survival RTS with roguelite and deckbuilding elements. Build, defend, and expand the village in a dark wood, illuminated only with lanterns.

name: Lab 83
description: A 2.5D person puzzle game with creative puzzle solving. Use different blocks from what are available on each level to overcome to the obstacles. Complete levels quickly or with few blocks to get achievements!

name: Outlands
description: Build, Upgrade, Reset, Repeat

name: Tretis
description: Tretis is the post-apocalyptic version of an arcade machine: immerse yourself in an adventure with subversive mechanics of extra-squeezed puzzle-action where you embody the cursor of an enigmatic game in a broken and harsh world.

name: Tr4pp3d
description: A 2D-puzzle game with sokoban elements. Your every step breaks the ground beneath, so choose your path carefully!

name: Guàishòu
description: Survive a derelict city overgrown by jungle and filled with grotesques mutants lurking in the dark. Use your lighting gun to see it through.

name: Xtract
description:
Embark on a treasure hunt in the Xtract shooter full of puzzles, PvE as well as PvP missions, treasure hunting, and much more!

The lost civilization has left rare artifacts and untold treasures on a mysterious island. Find them, outsmart your rivals and get all the loot!

Assemble your team, fight enemies and other adventurers! Get new weapons and supplies, customize equipment and use all the capabilities of modern technology and the power of mystical artifacts!

name: Case Guardians
description: Case Guardians, a thrilling multiplayer co-op experience that puts you in the heart of the action! In this fast-paced game, you and your friends embark on an exciting mission to protect a precious briefcase from waves of enemies cleverly crafted from everyday items!

name: Onmyoudou Origins
description: Onmyoudou Origins is an action Rpg with elements of Japanese folklore.

name: Fortune Rewritten: Costume Pack 1
description: A nice, small compact cosmetic bundle which features 4 brand new costumes that you can customize your player with!

name: Allogloom
description: Chaos has descended upon the town of Gruesome Grove and its fate rests in Nora’s hands. Join her on an oftentimes gory journey through a beautifully hand-drawn world. Discover forgotten truths, make peculiar friends, encounter monsters and solve puzzles in this mysterious and macabre adventure.

name: KnifePlayground: Horror Battle Royale
description: Multiplayer Survival Horror: 4 Players Co-op or Solo Battle Royale. Players have to cooperate or kill each other in a 3 floors mansion full of monsters which every floor closes after a deadly countdown. Shoot, stab, hide, upgrade and get stronger after every death by unpredictable Roguelite elements

name: Major Minor 2.0: (Re)Vision
description: Become intertwined in the fateful connection plaguing two worlds, bound together by a murder mystery, and a competition for the throne of a god. The award-winning visual novel, completely revamped! New script, new choices, and romance! Become The Savior today, and choose wisely...

name: Hentai: Nude Quest
description: Embark on an enchanting journey through the mystical realms of Hentai Nude Quest, a unique and visually captivating walking simulator that combines the allure of anime aesthetics with the tranquility of a lush forest.

name: Hell Galaxy
description: Hell Galaxy is the only game where you can experience the fusion of space battles, eerie specters, and daunting titans. This unique gameplay offers a mix of action, horror, and space exploration. Engage in dynamic mining, looting, and crafting while traversing an RPG-influenced cosmos.

name: Urban Smash
description: Urban Smash is an unreleased video game developed by Evolution Studios for the PlayStation 3. The game later was redeveloped into MotorStorm Apocalypse.

name: Mydhia Online
description:
Welcome to the world of Mydhia Online, an MMORPG that brings back the nostalgia of the golden era of RPGs, inspired by classics like Final Fantasy and Chrono Trigger. With 16-bit pixelated graphics, the game captures the same retro vibe as hits like Stardew Valley.

Get ready for real-time combat against hundreds of enemies in a complex and engaging storyline. But remember, Mydhia Online isn't just about solo adventures. Socialization is the key to success in this game, with party, guild, and EXP-sharing systems among friends.

So, join us, Wanderer, and dive yourself into the vast universe of Mydhia.

name: Seraph: In the Darkness
description: Seraph: In the Darkness is a classic dark fantasy. It's an action role-playing game (ARPG) with hack-and-slash combat mechanics, allowing for item customization tailored to your playstyle. Experience new thrills in the world of SERAPH, where aesthetics of darkness and fear combine

name: Maze Puzzle
description: Sin descripción

name: Play Dice
description: Sin descripción

name: Twin Cards
description: Matching game with an increasing amount of cards as the game continues.

name: Heli Mission
description: Clone of the Flash game Helicopter. An endless game where the player must guide the always-moving helicopter through obstacles. Some releases change the title to "Heli-Mission" (without the extra L); though in all releases, the high-score screen humorously spells "Name" as "NMAE". Later re-published by Waixing; the Waixing version uses a rendition of the "Tim 2" tune from Lemmings.

name: Access Block
description: A "match-3" puzzle game. Later re-published by Waixing; the Waixing version uses a rendition of Terriermon's theme from Digimon Battle Spirit.

name: Diesel Burners
description: Diesel Burners is a fast-paced aerial shooter. Destroy hordes of enemies while collecting resources and power-ups. Buy, upgrade, and customize your character and planes; and put your skills to the test facing bosses in a variety of single-player and multiplayer modes!

name: Airborne Arena
description: Airborne Arena is a shooter-racing game set in 2058's Rider City. Enter an action-packed new reality filled with deadly hoverbike races, as you take the role of "The Prodigy" and infiltrate the different Viker gangs in the story mode or challenge your friends to online races and deathmatch arenas.

name: Rhythm Station
description: Shoot to the beat! Rhythm Station is a rhythm-based action roguelike set in space
